scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Loan Application Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive applicant data from a loan application scoring model's output using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to extract income information, which is considered private and protected under financial regulations.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of a loan application scoring model using publicly available data.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: Loan application scoring in a large commercial bank. The model predicts loan default probability based on various applicant features (age, income, credit score, etc.).  Income is specifically masked in the model outputs to protect privacy.
